summary: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.
cast: Rani Mukerji|Ranbir Kapoor|Sonam Kapoor|Salman Khan|Zohra Sehgal|Begum Para|Atheya Chaudhri|Kenneth Desai|Vibha Chhibber|Farida Dadi|Darpan Srivastava|Pravishi Das|Neha Bam|Nupur Alankar|Vibhu Puri|Longinus|Neville Dadachanji|Sam Kerawala|Firdaus Mevawala|Ram|Shree Rammy Pandey
title: Saawariya
